query.description: ZLET002 배차일자 변경에 따른 호차정보 변경
query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZLET002 SET ZKNUM = #NEWZKNUM# , ZKNUM2 = '' , ERDAT = #ERDAT# , ERZET = #ERZET# , DPTEN = #DPTEN# , UPTEN = #UPTEN# , AEDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) , UZEIT = HEX(CURRENT TIME) , AENAM = #G_USER_ID# , LAEDA = HEX(CURRENT DATE) , CHANGE_TIME = HEX(CURRENT TIME) WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZKNUM = #ZKNUM# AND ZKNUM2 = #ZKNUM2#
